name: MatejNavara
description: This is a website for Matej Navara

scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin portfolio_contagion.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/portfolio_contagion.html && usemin portfolio_frosty.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/portfolio_frosty.html && usemin portfolio_greedy.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/portfolio_greedy.html && usemin portfolio_padma.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/portfolio_padma.html && usemin portfolio_pplf.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/portfolio_pplf.html && usemin portfolio_salg.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/portfolio_salg.html && usemin portfolio_sloth.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/portfolio_sloth.html && usemin portfolio_tidal.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/portfolio_tidal.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin

author: Matej Navara
